bio: Began playing tennis at age eight.
Enjoys playing hockey, soccer, and basketball.
Good friend is Ulf Dahlen of the Minnesota North Stars.
Father, Sture, is a construction engineer; mother, Solweig, works on
the education wing of the Swedish Sports Federation with gymnasts.
Has one brother Peter, 25, a journalist with Ostersund Post.
Coached by Olle Palmer of Club Salk.

all: We do not have any stats for this player.
